languages.text: "Чем гуще мрак вокруг, тем ярче пламя в моей душе. Ибо я клялась быть маяком для верных, и даже смерть не освободит от этой клятвы".
"The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."
languages.original_text: "Чем гуще мрак вокруг, тем ярче пламя в моей душе. Ибо я клялась быть маяком для верных, и даже смерть не освободит от этой клятвы".

traits.locale_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “黑暗越深，我灵魂中的火焰就越是明亮。因为我发过誓，要成为一切虔信之人的灯塔，哪怕是死亡也不能让我违背誓言。”
languages.original_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."

traits.locale_text: “黑暗越深，我灵魂中的火焰就越是明亮。因为我发过誓，要成为一切虔信之人的灯塔，哪怕是死亡也不能让我违背誓言。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Plus les ténèbres qui m'entourent sont épaisses, et plus la flamme qui anime mon âme est ardente. Même la mort ne pourra me libérer du serment de guider les fidèles dans l'obscurité. »
languages.original_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."

traits.locale_text: « Plus les ténèbres qui m'entourent sont épaisses, et plus la flamme qui anime mon âme est ardente. Même la mort ne pourra me libérer du serment de guider les fidèles dans l'obscurité. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Cuanto más profunda es la oscuridad que me rodea, más brilla el fuego de mi alma. He jurado servir de faro a los fieles y ni siquiera la muerte me librará de ese juramento».
languages.original_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."

traits.locale_text: «Cuanto más profunda es la oscuridad que me rodea, más brilla el fuego de mi alma. He jurado servir de faro a los fieles y ni siquiera la muerte me librará de ese juramento».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「周囲の闇が深いほど、魂の炎は明るく燃え上がる。私は信仰の灯台になると誓ったのだ、死を与えられようともその誓いから私を解放することはできない」
languages.original_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."

traits.locale_text: 「周囲の闇が深いほど、魂の炎は明るく燃え上がる。私は信仰の灯台になると誓ったのだ、死を与えられようともその誓いから私を解放することはできない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Je tiefer die Dunkelheit um mich herum, desto heller strahlt die Flamme in meiner Seele. Denn ich habe geschworen, ein Leuchtfeuer für die Gläubigen zu sein, und nicht einmal der Tod entlässt mich aus diesem Schwur."
languages.original_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."

traits.locale_text: "Je tiefer die Dunkelheit um mich herum, desto heller strahlt die Flamme in meiner Seele. Denn ich habe geschworen, ein Leuchtfeuer für die Gläubigen zu sein, und nicht einmal der Tod entlässt mich aus diesem Schwur."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."

languages.text: "Etrafımdaki karanlık ne kadar yoğunsa ruhumdaki alev de o kadar parlak yanar. Zira inançlıların dayanağı olmaya yemin ettim ve ölüm bile beni bu yeminden döndüremez."
languages.original_text: "The deeper the darkness around me, the brighter the flame in my soul. For I have sworn to be a beacon to the faithful, and not even death will release me from that vow."
